description: Hono skill test cases - bad patterns vs correct patterns

cases.description: Use await next() not callback style
cases.good: app.use('*', async (c, next) => { console.log('before'); await next() })

cases.description: Import middleware from hono/* not hono
cases.good: import { cors } from 'hono/cors'; import { jwt } from 'hono/jwt'

cases.description: Use HTTPException not Error for HTTP errors
Type the Hono generic for bindings
cases.good: const app = new Hono<{ Bindings: { DATABASE_URL: string } }>()

cases.description: Use c.env not process.env in Workers

cases.good: import { serve } from '@hono/node-server'; serve({ fetch: app.fetch, port: 3000 })

cases.description: Import streaming from helper not context
cases.good: import { stream } from 'hono/streaming'; return stream(c, async (s) => { ... })
import { streamSSE } from 'hono/streaming'; return streamSSE(c, async (s) => { await s.writeSSE({ data: '...' }) })

cases.description: Use c.json() not c.jsonT() in v4
Use hono/vercel not hono/nextjs in v4
